value.description: A baby growing inside a person, preparing to be born. In humans, pregnancy lasts for 18 days and is divided into 3 trimesters. As the pregnancy grows it will reduce the person's mobiOperationty. For some people, pregnancy may induce nausea or mood swings that can be hard to deal with.
Extract an ovum into a storage capsule. It can then be fertilized by another person, and finally implanted into a person to start a pregnancy.
